sourceMeaningMnemonic: The part of <radical>rice</radical> that <radical>stand</radical>s up tall in the air (at the end of the stalks) is the <kanji>grains</kanji>.
meaningInfo: If you think about this one it'll make good sense. Just imagine rice stalks standing up into the air.
readingMnemonic: You have a box of <kanji>grains</kanji>. <reading>Ryuu</reading> (<ja>りゅう</ja>) from Street Fighter is doing training by punching the grains to strengthen his fingers.
readingInfo: He has his hands flat, and stabs his hands into the grains. Yah! Yah! Yah!
